column1: "description": "Data provides details on the receipts under corporation tax from 2000-01 to 2011-12 in head of account such as Minor Head-Other Receipts
Head-Income Tax on Companies - Net Receipts
Receipts under Kar Vivad Samadhan Scheme
Tax on distributed profits of domestic comp.
Tax on distributed income to Unit Holders
Receipts Awaiting Transfer  to other Minor Heads
Total Corporation Tax (based on Total Minor heads and ADD CTDS above)
